Jeremiah or Jeremias__07.18__Queen of heaven: : That is, the moon, which they worshipped under that name.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__07.22__I commanded them not: : Viz., such sacrifices as the Jews at this time offered, without obedience; which was the thing principally commanded: so that in comparison with it, the offering of the holocausts and sacrifices was of small account.
